extension.name: Pickup or Free
extension.author: RuposTel.com
extension.description: This plugin enables you to have pickup or free delivery options as your shipping method.

field.label: Zip Range Start
field.description: Zip Range Start

field.name: zip_stop
field.label: Zip Range Stop
field.description: Zip Range Stop

field.name: zip_range1
field.label: Zip Range 1 for free shipping separated by comma
field.description: List of zip codes separated by comma. Add extra zip codes to the range defined above.

field.name: nbproducts_start
field.label: Minimum number of products per zip range

field.name: zip_range_error_here
field.label: Zip RANGE errorr under zip code field

field.name: mode
field.label: Choose mode
field.description: Select mode to run the plugin
field.option: MODE_0: Delivery with routes, timeslots and vehicles (wholesale 1, use com_delivery to configure)
MODE_2: Delivery with single vehicle per zip code (sandwitch shop, use this plugin to configure)

field.name: default_selected
field.label: Select which section should be selected by default
field.description: Select if pickup in store or delivery should be selected by default

field.name: reservations
field.label: Use reservation system (per capacity of the vehicle)

field.name: debug
field.label: Debug Mode (for testing only)
field.description: This option will print data to javascript console

field.name: pickup_text
field.label: Insert a text which will be shown in the order details page and emails. User {date} for selected date and {time} for selected time. This text will be used for Pickup type.
field.default: Your order will be pickuped on {date} at {time}

field.name: free_text
field.label: Set html text when free shipping is not available
field.description: Set text when free shipping is not available

field.name: disable_pickup_time
field.label: Disable 'pickup in store' time dropdown
field.description: Disable time selection for pickup in store

field.name: disable_pickup_today
field.label: Disable today for pickup
field.description: Disable to choose today for pickup

field.name: pickup_start_time
field.label: Pickup Start Time
field.description: Set time from which the pickup in store is available

field.name: pickup_end_time
field.label: Pickup End Time
field.description: Set time to which the pickup in store is available

field.name: pickup_custom_slots
field.label: Pickup custom slots insted of time slots
field.description: Custom slots for Pickup (opening hours)

field.name: pickup_slots
field.label: Pickup slots separated by semicolon
field.description: Enter slots for pickup time options such as AM;PM or similar

field.name: delivery_text
field.label: Insert a text which will be shown in the order details page and emails. User {date} for selected date and {time} for selected time. This text will be used for Delivery type.
field.default: Your order will be delivered on {date} at {time}

field.name: error_delivery_text
field.label: Set an error text in case 2 customers try to order for the same delivery.
field.default: Selected date and time is already reserverd

field.name: free_start_time
field.label: Free Delivery Start Time
field.description: Set time to which the pickup in store is available

field.name: free_end_time
field.label: Free Delivery End Time
field.description: Set time to which the pickup in store is available

field.name: free_disable
field.label: Set number of minutes to block around an order (for delivery)
field.description: Set number of minutes for which to disable time if an order is already made for free delivery.

field.name: time_ahead
field.label: Time length of the delivery. (how long before the order must be done for delivery)

field.name: custom_slots
field.label: Delivery custom slots insted of time slots
field.description: Custom slots

field.name: slots
field.label: Delivery slots separated by semicolon
field.description: Enter slots for delivery time options such as AM;PM or similar

field.name: max_slot_weight
field.label: Limit availability of the slot at the selected date by total sum of weight ordered per slot.
field.description: Amount is in selected UOM per above config

field.name: routes
field.label: Routes separated by semicolon (not for MODE_2)

field.name: time_period
field.label: Time iteration
field.description: Set number of minutes

field.name: no_options
field.label: Set text if the delivery is not available per selected route.
field.description: Set empty option text
